index.title: 16 Free Math Memory Games — Train Your Brain Online
index.description: Sharpen working memory, speed, and focus with 16 free math brain games. Grid puzzles, flash calculation, pattern recall, chimp tests, and more. No signup, play instantly.
index.keywords: math memory game, brain training games free, number memory test, math brain games, working memory training, cognitive games online

flash.title: Flash Math — How Fast Can You Calculate From Memory?
flash.description: A math problem appears and vanishes. Type the answer before you forget. Tests mental calculation speed and short-term recall. Free, no signup.
flash.keywords: flash math game, speed calculation test, mental math speed, fast math memory game

openGraph.og:title: Flash Math — How Fast Can You Calculate From Memory?
openGraph.og:description: A math problem appears and vanishes. Type the answer before you forget. Tests mental calculation speed and short-term recall.

twitterCard.twitter:title: Flash Math — How Fast Can You Calculate From Memory?
twitterCard.twitter:description: A math problem appears and vanishes. Type the answer before you forget. Tests mental calculation speed and short-term recall.

match.title: Match Master — Pair Math Problems to Answers
match.description: Flip cards to match math problems with their correct answers. A memory card game that tests both recall and arithmetic. Multiple difficulty levels.
match.keywords: math matching game, memory card game math, number pair game, math puzzle cards

openGraph.og:title: Match Master — Pair Math Problems to Answers

grid.title: Grid Genius — Memorize Numbers, Then Answer
grid.description: Study a grid of numbers, then the grid vanishes. Answer questions about what was where. A spatial memory challenge that gets harder each round.
grid.keywords: spatial memory game, number grid memory, visual memory test, number position recall

sequence.title: Sequence Solver — Spot the Pattern, Predict the Next
sequence.description: Given a number sequence, figure out the rule and predict what comes next. Covers arithmetic, geometric, Fibonacci, and tricky mixed patterns.
sequence.keywords: number sequence game, pattern recognition test, math patterns, what comes next, logic puzzle numbers

speed-round.title: Speed Round — Solve Fast, Then Recall Your Answers
speed-round.description: Solve a burst of math problems under time pressure, then recall what you answered. Tests attention, speed, and working memory simultaneously.
speed-round.keywords: speed math game, working memory test, timed math challenge, math under pressure

hidden-order.title: Hidden Order — The Chimp Test for Number Memory
hidden-order.description: Numbers flash on screen, then hide. Click them in order from memory. Based on the famous chimp test that most humans fail. How far can you go?
hidden-order.keywords: chimp test online, number memory test, working memory game, hidden numbers, sequential recall

recall.title: Rapid Recall — Memorize Numbers, Answer Questions
recall.description: A set of numbers appears briefly. Memorize them, then answer: What was the largest? The sum? The 3rd number? Tests how much your working memory can hold.
recall.keywords: number recall test, digit span test, working memory game, short term memory numbers

mental-trail.title: Mental Trail — Keep a Running Total in Your Head
mental-trail.description: Start with a number. Add 7. Subtract 3. Multiply by 2. Can you track the running total as operations stream in? A true test of mental arithmetic.
mental-trail.keywords: running total game, mental arithmetic test, working memory math, calculation stream game

equation-echo.title: Equation Echo — Memorize the Equation, Fill the Gaps
equation-echo.description: See a complete equation, then parts disappear. Reconstruct it from memory. Trains your brain to chunk and recall mathematical structure.
equation-echo.keywords: equation memory game, math recall test, fill in the blank math, missing number puzzle

symbol-sums.title: Symbol Sums — Decode Symbols, Solve the Equation
symbol-sums.description: Each symbol has a hidden value. Memorize the pairings, then solve equations using symbols instead of numbers. Tests associative memory and mental math.
symbol-sums.keywords: symbol math game, associative memory test, decode symbols, cryptarithmetic puzzle

matrix-memory.title: Matrix Memory — Find Primes, Evens & Patterns in a Grid
matrix-memory.description: Scan a number grid and memorize which cells match a rule (primes, evens, multiples of 3). The grid vanishes — click the right cells from memory.
matrix-memory.keywords: matrix memory game, number grid puzzle, prime number game, spatial memory math, selective attention test

binary-blitz.title: Binary Blitz — Memorize and Rebuild Binary Sequences
binary-blitz.description: A binary sequence flashes: 10110010. Reconstruct it from memory. Hacker-themed pattern memory challenge that tests your short-term recall of 0s and 1s.
binary-blitz.keywords: binary memory game, pattern recall test, 0s and 1s game, digital memory challenge, hacker game

color-code.title: Color Code — Remember Color-Number Pairs, Decode Fast
color-code.description: Red = 7, Blue = 3, Green = 5. Memorize the pairings, then decode a color sequence into numbers. Tests visual-associative memory and recall speed.
color-code.keywords: color memory game, visual association test, color number pairing, associative recall game

spin-logic.title: Spin Logic — Mentally Rotate a Number Grid
spin-logic.description: See a grid of numbers. Now rotate it 90 degrees in your mind. What number is at position (2,3)? A spatial-visual working memory challenge.
spin-logic.keywords: mental rotation game, spatial reasoning test, grid rotation puzzle, visual working memory

path-finder.title: Path Finder — Trace a Lit Path, Add the Numbers
path-finder.description: A path lights up across a number grid, then fades. Recall the path and sum the numbers it touched. Tests sequential visual memory and rapid addition.
path-finder.keywords: path memory game, visual sequence recall, trail calculation, sequential memory test

shape-count.description: Numbers sit inside circles, squares, and triangles scattered across the screen. Quickly sum only the numbers inside the target shape. Tests selective focus.
